doc.title: Close Up
doc.plot: Maltese personalities who live in Malta or abroad reveal all about their lives and careers. Guests include international soprano Miriam Gauci, Canadian-Maltese filmmaker director Mario Azzopardi of Outer Limits and Stargate series fame, Dr.Edward de Bono who created 'lateral-thinking' which is also a term included in Oxford's English Dictionary, Malta's top criminal defense lawyer and daughter of the country's former President Gianella Caruana Curran, multi-millionaire and entrepeneur Albert Mizzi, architect Richard England and former government minister Alex Cachia Zammit.
